column1: '''Frery''' was the first month of the [[Bree]] and [[Eastfarthing]] calendars
column2: corresponding to the [[Afteryule]] in the [[Shire Calendar]]. It was the thirty days immediately following the holiday of [[Yule]]
column3: approximately corresponding to modern [[23 December]] through [[21 January]].<ref>{{App|Calendars}}</ref>
